h2_title: Crimson Silver Cart Boss Fight and Guide
content: The only real difference between this fight and the one with the previous carts is that the Crimson-Silver Cart has a wider area that it attacks in. Not only will it shoot flames out at the bottom all around it, but it will also roll around and try to mow you down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crimson-Silver_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Crimson-Silver Cart', specifically from the subsection 'Crimson Silver Cart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The only real difference between this fight and the one with the previous carts is that the Crimson-Silver Cart has a wider area that it attacks in. Not only will it shoot flames out at the bottom all around it, but it will also roll around and try to mow you down.
